com.jde.model.entity.bullet

Class Wave

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.jde.model.entity.bullet.Wave
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Spawnable

    public class Wave
extends java.lang.Object
implements Spawnable
    This Wave class represents a set of bullets and sub-waves to spawn. It is a two-in-one class, it can act like a bullet spawner or it can manage multiple sub-waves which also spawn bullets (superwave)
    Author:
    HarZe (David Serrano)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected boolean absolute
      If true, the origin spawn point will be the center of the game board
      protected Bullet bullet
      Template bullet of the wave
      protected int bullets
      Number of bullets in the wave
      protected double elapsed
      Elapsed time since the wave started
      protected double interval
      Time between repetitions (they can overlap)
      protected java.util.ArrayList<DirectionModifier> modifiers
      Wave direction modifiers
      protected int repeat
      Number of times the wave will repeat
      protected boolean spawned
      Spawned state of the wave
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Wave> spawnedWaves
      List of currently working sub-waves
      protected Spawner<Bullet> spawnerBullets
      Spawner of bullets
      protected Spawner<Wave> spawnerWaves
      Spawner of sub-waves
      protected Vertex spawnOrigin
      Origin vertex point to spawn the bullets
      protected Vertex spawnPoint
      Spawn position relative to the origin
      protected double spawnTime
      Time stamp of the instant the wave spawns
      protected java.util.ArrayList<Wave> subWaves
      List of sub-waves
      protected double timeEnd
      Elapsed time between the spawn and the last bullet spawn
      protected double timeExponent
      Exponent modifier of the time
      protected double timeStart
      Elapsed time between the spawn and the first bullet spawn
      protected double timeStarted
      Tiem stamp of the moment the wave started
      protected int waves
      Number of sub-waves in the wave

        total - Total number of iterations

        public static void modifyWave(Wave w,
              DirectionModifier mod,
              int step,
              int total)
        This method modifies the direction of all the sub-waves and bullets of a given wave, a given modifier, and a iteration state
        Parameters:
        w - The wave to modify
        mod - The direction modifier to apply to the wave
        step - Step number of the iteration
        total - Total number of iterations
